name: Cadence Data Soft
tag_list: gui, network-security, protocols, monitoring, management, encryption, compression, scsi
overview:
What do we do? We are “Software Services Company” focusing on core Storage, Networking, and GUI technologies. We provide uncompromised, high quality enterprise class software development and related services. Following are the services that we offer

Services: • Software Product Sustaining • Emerging Technologies POC • Hosted Engineering • Product Verification • Qualification - Logo Certification • Licensing & Packaging • Technical Support

Domains: • Core Computer Networking • Core Storage • Virtualization Cloud • Network & Data Security • GUI

How do we do? We have derived our processes from industry standard “V” model. The V-model represents a software development process which may be considered an extension of the waterfall model. The V-Model demonstrates the relationships between each phase of the development life cycle and its associated phase of testing. Our processes are tailored for each type of service, to ensure only adequate efforts are spent on processes. These proven processes have evolved over a period.

How do we stand apart? We are doing one thing at a time & staying focused on it, to make sure that we deliver our best. Our investment is focused on procuring and development of custom tools that will automate, assist development /testing of software around technologies related to above domain. We believe we have unmatched processes when it comes to developing/sustaining products, POC or GUI. This enables us to simply deliver results consistently.
